com.qtplaf.library.task

Class TaskRunner

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qtplaf.library.task.TaskRunner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Task, java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FileCopy, FileScanner, SampleTask, TaskAverages, TaskCopy, TaskDownloadTicker, TaskRunnerList, TaskRunnerThreads, TaskScanner

    public abstract class TaskRunner
extends java.lang.Object
implements Task
    Base task implementation. Extender must implement the abstract methods:
    • countSteps()
    • execute()
    • isCancelSupported()
    • isDeterminate()
    • isPauseSupported()
    To execute the task call the run() method, not the execute() that is called whithin run(), tracking several issues like termination and exceptions.

    Pause/resume and cancel support is recomended be managed through the usage at the begining of the main loop of,

    • if (checkCancel()) break;
    • if (checkPause()) continue;
    because updating the internal cancelled and paused is not permited.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas
